model.comment: SRC16 is a stationary decoder with serial bus

label.label: Note: Changes to Option CVs are not recognized until SRC16 power is cycled.
Enable gateway for DCC commands from track to bus
- Requires bus interface and DCC control to be enabled
Enable transmit and receive on bus
Enable receiving DCC commands from track
- When disabled, DCC gateway is disabled
Note: In a Digirax system the bus is called LocoNet
Send input state at power on
Send output state at power on
Send primary input state at Digitrax interrogation request
Send output state at Digitrax interrogation request

display.tooltip: Required for ops mode
Sets the Ops Mode address

label.label: This is the same as a Loco address

display.tooltip: Output disabled when corresponding input grounded
Inverts all the output drive
The decoder version number (read only)
The manufacturer's ID number (read only)
Determines the input addess
Sends opposite switch state from previous send - Switch Request only
Configures the input for specfic use
Inverts the normal state of Close when input goes hi
Configures the input simulas

label.label: To form a group set both outputs to the same address with one to throw and the other to close.
Note: If a sensor message is selected then switch state c and t is used for sensor hi and lo respectively.

label.label: Do not use for Bi-Color LEDs

label.label: Sets the output state to always be the same at power on
Only applies if Option 2 is selected
Note: If a sensor message is selected to execute a route then
switch state c and t is used for sensor hi and lo respectively.
